series: Works of Yone Noguchi = Noguchi Yonejirō sōsho ;
title: Selected poems of Yone Noguchi
by_statement: selected by himself, with the Japanese version.

notes.value:
Last 232 p. in Japanese numbering.
Series statement transliterated from Japanese.
Title in red and black, with vignette; guard sheet.
Paper wrappers printed in Japanese and English; illustrated with reproduction of sculpted bust of Noguchi by Alfeo Faggi.
Biographical sketch precedes t.p.  Brief critical comments, p. [127]-[128], by George Meredith, William Rossetti, Thomas Hardy, others.
LC copy inscribed: To the Pennells from Yone Noguchi, [followed by Japanese inscription].
